unnormalised: trikoṇṇāṇchea kṣetrafallā vixim puchṇāk kel'lea prashnāk lagun, heronachem sūtra vaprun, dillo pākṣa a=3cm, b=4cm ani c=5cm asa, ardha-parimiti 's' (3+4+5)/2 = 6cm asa. dekhun, kṣetrafall sqrt(s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)) = sqrt(6(6-3)(6-4)(6-5)) = sqrt(6*3*2*1) = sqrt(36) = 6 sq. cm. asa. trikoṇamiti-i vaprun sakāyta, punn hea pad'dot jāṇāsl'lea pākṣānkhatir sāmānyatvech sonpi asa. prayog karcheāvelā khuṇkacheāādī ganṇeāchek vāstavyatai vicharāt ghevnk.
normalised: trikoNa chEaM area viShaiM praShnAkhatir, hErOn's phOrmul'lO vapar karun, diShTi baazu a baraabar tIn sentIMITar, b baraabar chaar sentIMITar anI c baraabar paaMch sentIMITar, ardha-parimiti 's' tIn jOD chaar jOD paaMch bhaagi dhaAn baraabar saha sentIMITar asaa. ten'na, area baraabar asa s chEaM vargamuLL s gunn'lO s vada a gunn'lO s vada b gunn'lO s vada c baraabar saha gunn'lO saha vada tIn gunn'lO saha vada chaar gunn'lO saha vada paaMch baraabar saha vaTTi tIn vaTTi dhaAn vaTTi eka vargamuLL baraabar tIs dhaAn chEaM vargamuLL baraabar saha chaurasa sentIMITar. trikONamitiyuM vaparuM yEta, puNnI hi riti samanyataa mahit baazu lambeenkhatir sahaj saa. vaparuMcheAadhi gaNanenaaMka dUritataakhaati talaSha ghE.
text: trikoṇṇāṇchea kṣetrafallā vixim puchṇāk kel'lea prashnāk lagun, heronachem sūtra vaprun, dillo pākṣa a=3cm, b=4cm ani c=5cm asa, ardha-parimiti 's' (3+4+5)/2 = 6cm asa. dekhun, kṣetrafall sqrt(s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)) = sqrt(6(6-3)(6-4)(6-5)) = sqrt(6*3*2*1) = sqrt(36) = 6 sq. cm. asa. trikoṇamiti-i vaprun sakāyta, punn hea pad'dot jāṇāsl'lea pākṣānkhatir sāmānyatvech sonpi asa. prayog karcheāvelā khuṇkacheāādī ganṇeāchek vāstavyatai vicharāt ghevnk.
